characteristic.name: Average Current
characteristic.description:
The Average Current characteristic is used to represent average electric current over a period of time.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

structure.description: Refer to the Electric Current characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.electric_current}.
Refer to the Time Exponential 8 characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.time_exponential_8}.
